file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-36-06 - CENTER FUSELAGE IV - PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CENTER FUSELAGE IV - PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of center fuselage IV - passenger cabin LH/RH sides for general condition. B. Related Zones: 261/262. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 17727.0 thru STA X = 20793.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 15721.0 thru STA X = 17253.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CENTER FUSELAGE IV - PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS AERODYNAMIC SEAL- ALL 05-20-36-200-801-A ING- EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL IN- SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-36 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-36-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CENTER FUSELAGE IV - PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS AERODYNAMIC SEALING- EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SRMD Zonal Task 53-Z261-213-002-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of center fuselage IV, at zones 261/262, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 56-20-01-100-801-A/700 PASSENGER CABIN WINDOWS - CLEANING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Center fuselage III - passenger cabin win- 1 Does the task dows I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-007-A (1) Put the ladder in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-36 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area ( AMM TASK 56-20-01-100-801-A/700) and (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External Inspection of Passenger Cabin Windows Aerodynamic Sealing (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-007-A (1) Examine the passenger cabin windows aerodynamic sealing for scratched, scored, cracked and ruptured (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-007-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-36 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
